Package virtualcasino

Class Slots

  • java.lang.Object
    • virtualcasino.Slots

  • public class Slots
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the game of slots, it allows you to create a slot game, bet money and win/lose money.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Slots​(Player givenPlayer)
      This is the constructor for the Slots game play.

      • randomizeSlots

        public void randomizeSlots​()
        Randomizes the slots based on certain odds. Tens - 20% Jacks - 30% Queens - 25% Kings - 15% Aces - 10%

      • updateWallet

        public int updateWallet​()
        Based on the current array of slots this will return the players winnings and this will update the player wallet.
        Returns:
        retVal - the amount of money that the player won/lost

      • winLose

        public java.lang.String winLose​(int playerMoney)
        based on the amount of money the player won/lost. this method will return a string to output to the player
        Parameters:
        playerMoney - - the players winings/losings
        Returns:
        retVal - a string that will be outputted to the player

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        boolean value based on if the bet is valid of not
